BBFN1.M.DE.N.1.A.W1.S1P.FH.T.BN00.Z01.BG: Claims of enterprises on non-residents / Total / All countries

General: Up to and including November 2009 assets held abroad by households in Germany. Foreign assets of banks (MFIs) in Germany are excluded. Statistical breaks have not been eliminated; the changes in stocks are thus not comparable with the transactions recorded under "Capital transactions with non-residents".
